underlying_goal: Modify a Databricks gold_order materialized view query to include additional address columns (region/city, address1, address2) from the SELL_DELIY_ADDR table
friction_detail: Claude initially suggested using a separate SELL_DELIY_ADDR_ADD table for the STATE column instead of recognizing NATI_CITY in the already-joined SELL_DELIY_ADDR table; user had to correct this.
brief_summary: User wanted to add address-related columns (region, addr1, addr2) to a Databricks gold_order query; after an initial wrong approach corrected by the user, Claude successfully modified the query in all 4 required locations.
